title: Dotdash Meredith (Now People inc.)
headline: Helping The Balance bring financial literacy to a new generation of users.
description: The Balance is a website focused on simplifying personal finance topics and news. The Balance team is currently working on a rebrand that is aimed to freshen up their existing brand, as well as to make the website more appealing to a younger generation of users. To kickstart The Balance’s site rebrand, I spearheaded a rebrand of the site’s advice column, My Two Cents.
